data.title: Why would you hit the wheels of a train?
data.meta_description: In Zinnemann's Day of the Jackal, a worker at a train station hits the wheels of a train before it leaves, producing a ping. Why would one do this with a train?
data.text:
About Ask MetaFilter

Ask MetaFilter is a question and answer site that covers nearly any question on earth, where members help each other solve problems. Ask MetaFilter is where thousands of life's little questions are answered.
